from collections import defaultdict

def find_longest_streak(n, ribbons):
    nmfr = [0] / 100001
    ocfr = [0] * 100001
    setb = 0
    (mnb, mxb) = (1, 1)
    strk = 0
    for (ind, i) in enumerate(ribbons):
        nmfr[i] += 1
        ocfr[nmfr[i]] += 1
        ocfr[nmfr[i] - 1] -= 1
        if ocfr[nmfr[i]] == 1:
            setb += 1
        if ocfr[nmfr[i] - 1] == 0:
            setb -= 1
            if mnb == nmfr[i] - 1:
                mnb += 1
        mnb = min(mnb, nmfr[i])
        mxb = max(mxb, nmfr[i])
        if mxb == mnb and ocfr[mxb] == 1 or mxb == mnb == 1 or (mxb - mnb == 1 and ocfr[mxb] == 1) or (setb == 2 and ocfr[mnb] == 1):
            strk = ind + 1
    return strk
